sentences.sContent: The judge wants to see a revision of the procedures.
sentences.sCn: 法官希望对程序进行修改。

sentences.sContent: I know I haven’t done enough revision for tomorrow’s exam.
sentences.sCn: 我知道我对明天的考试准备不足。

synos.tran: 修正；复习；[图情][印刷]修订本

words.tran: 修改；校订；复习（revise的过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: the process of changing something in order to improve it by correcting it or including new information or ideas
